overview: Kimberly Gomez is the Director of Social Media Marketing for Weemba. She joined Weemba in August 2012 and is tasked with crafting Weemba’s image and influence in the social media and online world. She is a Magna Cum Laude graduate from Florida International University with Bachelors in Mass Communications as well as Bachelors in English. Kimberly’s media experience is varied in the South Florida area and includes positions at NBC6 Television in their News department as well as The Miami Herald Media Company in their marketing department. She also worked with several cutting edge Miami based social media marketing companies and helped craft the online image of such national clients as Tracfone and Net10. Her varied experience with traditional and up and coming forms of marketing, particularly social media, made Weemba a natural choice for Kimberly considering their mix of the traditional and cutting edge in the financial world.
